summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing construction of the Northeast Northlake Way Storm Drain Separation Project; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor; making additional appropriations from the Sewer Fund for works or art in connection therewith; and for reimbursement of the Sewer Improvement Fund for expenditures made in connection therewith under Ordinance 101427; and abandoning the appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund made by Ordinance 105151 in connection with such project.
